data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Robert A. Johnson (2015): A taxonomic revision of South American species of the seed-harvester ant genus Pogonomyrmex (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Part I. Zootaxa 4029 (1): 1-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4029.1.1
